bio:
Crypto enthusiast
Moderator of a community crypto server
contributionDescription:
I spend several hours a day helping people as a helper on a community discord, particularly on the subject of optimism.
This makes it possible to support new people in using the blockchain (whether in choosing the applications to use, paying attention to their interactions and avoiding scams).

At the same time I deploy NFT collections from time to time on different platforms.

contributionLinks.description: An NFT collection on Zora with Futuristic car against mountain backdrop.
Moderator and helper on a French community discord of 2000 people

impactDescription: Thanks to the help provided on Discord, many people were able to avoid interacting with malicious contracts. In addition, I was also able to help people achieve their goal, which they sometimes had difficulty achieving (whether it was deploying a contract, stacking tokens, swap or wrap, bridge...)
pwCategorySuggestions: Community Building, NFT Aggregator, Blockchain Education
